title: Can England win against New Zealand in the Rugby World Cup semi-final? Six things they must do to beat the All Blacks
text:
On Saturday in Yokohama, England take on New Zealand for a place in the final of Rugby World Cup 2019.

To beat the reigning champions, and end the All Blacks’ bid for a third consecutive title, they must produce a formidable performance. Here are six non-negotiable areas to start with.

1. Kick well from the start and throughout

England’s kicking game blew hot and cold last time they faced New Zealand, at Twickenham 11 months ago. Owen Farrell’s kick-off was just about perfect. Brodie Retallick spilled it and the hosts launched the punchy attack that led to Chris Ashton’s try.

Ben Youngs’ box-kicking started extremely well, giving an aggressive chase – led by the exceptional Sam Underhill – to...
description: On Saturday in Yokohama, England take on New Zealand for a place in the final of Rugby World Cup 2019.
